summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mapbox integration for RentAll marketplace. All core map features working perfectly including list/map toggle, price markers, popups, and static location maps on listing pages.

ui_bugs.issue: Map marker highlighting not working when sidebar listing is selected

passed_tests: Frontend: Search page list/map view toggle functionality
Frontend: Mapbox map loads successfully with proper token
Frontend: Map markers display listing prices ($50)
Frontend: Map marker popups open with listing details (title, price, image, link)
Frontend: Popup close functionality works correctly
Frontend: Map navigation controls (zoom in/out) functional
Frontend: Map interactivity and canvas clicking works
Frontend: Static map on individual listing pages displays correctly
Frontend: Location marker on static maps visible
Frontend: Mapbox attribution and logo present (token validation)
Frontend: Map responsiveness across different viewport sizes
Frontend: Sidebar listings display correctly in map view
Frontend: Navigation between list and map views seamless

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All core Mapbox features working, one minor UI enhancement issue

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix map marker highlighting when sidebar listing is selected - the selectedListing state should trigger visual highlighting of corresponding map marker
